Don't come here just to complain about my behavior, Jaime Bayly says angrily over the outro music.`` And don't be so damned boring.'' Jaime Bayly is a man of many parts. . Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities. On Saturday, he wrote,
